title: Ikitai to Ie! Oretachi wa Nakama Da!!
plot: Since she was 8, Robin's life has been a constant struggle to survive. Everybody has told her that her existence was a crime, and now Luffy begs her to stay alive.

title: Arigatou Merry! Yuki ni Kemuru Wakare no Umi
plot: The crew must finally say goodbye to their ship merry.

title: Nakama no Itami wa Waga Itami: Zoro Kesshi no Tatakai
plot: Zoro tries to stop Kuma from killing Luffy and Kuma offers Zoro a deal, he can take away Luffy's pain but he has to implant it in Zoro instead. Kuma tells him that he could die from all the pain but Zoro accept the offer without hesitation.

title: Kesareta Nakama-tachi: Mugiwara Ichimi Saigo no Hi
plot: Sentomaru reveals that Kuma has the ability to make people fly through the sky to far away places.

title: Hi o mo Yaki Tsukusu Chikara: Akainu Hijou no Tsuigeki
plot: Whitebeard aims to take down the whole of Marineford and orders his crew and the other pirates to flee.

title: Gear Fourth! Kyoui no Bounce Man!
plot: Luffy casts off his sandals and activates Gear Fourth. His body changes with a ballooned torso covered with tribal like markings and coated with Busoshoku Haki.

title: Straw Hat Luffy! The Man Who Will Become the King of the Pirates!
plot: Yamato reveals her dream to Ace in a flashback. Meanwhile Luffy, Zoro, Law, Kidd and Killer confront Kaido and Big Mom on the rooftop.

title: The Three-Sword Style of the Supreme King! Zoro vs. King
plot: As the battle between Zoro and King reaches its climax, Zoro, after figuring out the secret of King's abilities, uses his newfound power to create the King of Hell Three Sword Style.

title: Luffy VS Usopp! Butsukaru Otoko no Iji
plot: The most terrible fight begins and Usopp has prepared some tricks to fool Luffy, but the strength of the captain is clear. Memories go back and forth while even Merry is crying.

title: Kobushi ni Kometa Omoi! Luffy Konshin no Gatling
plot: "Luffy Vs Lucci: The Final Round". On the Hesitation Bridge, Zoro and rest of The Straw Hat Crew engage marines.

title: Tekken Sakuretsu! Auction o Buttsubuse
plot: The auction continues, but Saint Charlos arrives and ruins the Straw Hats' plan to buy Camie back by placing an exorbitant bid on her.

title: Taishou Kizuru no Moukou Mugiwara Ichimi Zettaizetsumei!
plot: Usopp and Brook's attempt to attack Kizaru and save Zoro's life failed.

title: Sorezore no Eranda Michi: Luffy vs Garp!
plot: Luffy unwillingly hits Garp, who is blocking his way to Ace. As Garp falls, the bridge crumbles.

title: Ace Kyuushutsu! Shirohige Saigo no Senchou Meirei!
plot: Ace is freed at last as he and Luffy fight their way back to escape from Marineford.

title: Kotae o Sagashite: Hiken Ace Senjou ni Shisu
plot: An eerie silence falls over the battlefield as Luffy and Ace share a heartbreaking final moment together.

title: Kaigun Honbu Houkai! Shirohige Kotobanaki Ikari!
plot: Luffy's has a breakdown due to the emotional trauma of Ace's death, causing Jinbe to take him away.

title: Kejime o Tsukeru: Shirohige vs Kurohige Kaizokudan
plot: Blackbeard and his pirates arrive in Marineford, as they are taken down from the execution platform by Whitebeard.

title: Hisshi no Sakebi: Unmei o Kaeru Yuuki Aru Suubyou
plot: The fight in Marineford still rages on, as Trafalgar Law arrives to rescue Luffy.

title: Shanks Kenzan! Choujou Sensou Tsui ni Shuuketsu
plot: Law and his crew take Jinbe and Luffy inside their submarine.

title: Yuke Law: Yasashiki Otoko Saigo no Tatakai!
plot: After recalling how he killed his father and met his executives as a child, Donquixote Doflamingo confronts his brother, Rosinante.
